java/liquibase/database/sql/SetNullableStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 public class SetNullableStatement implements SqlStatement {
00007     private String schemaName;
00008     private String tableName;
00009     private String columnName;
00010     private String columnDataType;
00011     private boolean nullable;
00012 
00013     public SetNullableStatement(String schemaName, String tableName, String columnName, String columnDataType, boolean nullable) {
00014         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00015         this.tableName = tableName;
00016         this.columnName = columnName;
00017         this.columnDataType = columnDataType;
00018         this.nullable = nullable;
00019     }
00020 
00021     public String getSchemaName() {
00022         return schemaName;
00023     }
00024 
00025     public String getTableName() {
00026         return tableName;
00027     }
00028 
00029     public String getColumnName() {
00030         return columnName;
00031     }
00032 
00033     public String getColumnDataType() {
00034         return columnDataType;
00035     }
00036 
00037     public boolean isNullable() {
00038         return nullable;
00039     }
00040 
00041     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00042         if (!supportsDatabase(database)) {
00043             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(this, database);
00044         }
00045         
00046         String nullableString;
00047         if (isNullable()) {
00048             nullableString = " NULL";
00049         } else {
00050             nullableString = " NOT NULL";
00051         }
00052 
00053         if (database instanceof OracleDatabase || database instanceof SybaseDatabase) {
00054             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " MODIFY " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()) + nullableString;
00055         } else if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00056             if (getColumnDataType() == null) {
00057                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Database requires columnDataType parameter", this, database);
00058             }
00059             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()) + " " + getColumnDataType() + nullableString;
00060         } else if (database instanceof MySQLDatabase) {
00061             if (getColumnDataType() == null) {
00062                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Database requires columnDataType parameter", this, database);
00063             }
00064             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " MODIFY " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()) + " " + getColumnDataType() + nullableString;
00065         } else if (database instanceof DerbyDatabase || database instanceof CacheDatabase) {
00066             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN  " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()) + nullableString;
00067         } else if (database instanceof HsqlDatabase) {
00068 //            if (getColumnDataType() == null) {
00069 //                throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Database requires columnDataType parameter", this, database);
00070 //            }
00071             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN  " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()) + " " + getColumnDataType() + nullableString;
00072         } else if (database instanceof FirebirdDatabase) {
00073             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(this, database);
00074         } else if (database instanceof MaxDBDatabase) {
00075                         return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " COLUMN  " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()) + (isNullable() ? " DEFAULT NULL" : " NOT NULL");
00076         }
00077         return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN  " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()) + (isNullable()?" DROP NOT NULL":" SET NOT NULL");
00078     }
00079 
00080     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00081         return ";";
00082     }
00083 
00084     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00085         return !(database instanceof FirebirdDatabase || 
00086                         database instanceof SQLiteDatabase);
00087     }
00088 }
